overview: Serenity is an art dealer whose artwork just hasn't been selling like it used to. Why with people only interested in 'interactive' ways of being entertained and intellectually stimulated, Serenity soon realizes that her art gallery has become a thing of the past. What's a girl to do? Surrender to the lure of changing times of course! Join Serenity and her gal pal Devinn Lane as they succumb to the power of the Internet and start their own web cam house The Love Shack! As the web site quickly becomes one of the most popular on the net, the girls become living proof that sex does indeed sell! With sexy stars like Serenity and Devinn Lane, who wouldn't want to watch? Love Shack, log on and get off.
tagline: This Place is Wired for the Net and Ready to Rock!
title: Love Shack
